overview: In his youth Shaun Micallef almost joined the priesthood. Now he wonders if he may have missed his one shot at the answers to lifeâ€™s big questions. Heading to India, a country where spirituality and the search for meaning is very much a national past time, he immerses himself in the Hindu world of Gods, Gurus and the Ganges. In a bid to get to the heart of the faith, Shaun pushes well beyond his comfort zone on a physical, mental and spiritual adventure. He journeys to the source of the Ganges high in the Himalayas - all the while offering his own unique observations on his quest to find the meaning of life.
tagline: Shaun Micallef dips into Hinduism (and the Ganges)
title: Shaun Micallef's Stairway to Heaven
